title: Game Progress Route
content:
re betraying your ally? Or are you asking me to? Very well. I'll kill Gortash. Gale will live. After that, we settle things for the final Netherstone. Gortash can wait. First, I'm confronting you, monster. I'll comply. Just promise not to harm Gale.

Choose the first option, leading Orin to explain that they aren't allies, just two forces in balance. Then inquire about Gortash's whispers, and she'll confirm that she sees them. She adds that Bhaal's age is drawing near and insinuates that you cou
